text: Kandi ntibarahire bamwe mubafise inyifato nziza y’idini hamwe nabafise ubuzima bwiza muri mwebwe, muguha muncuti no mubakene hamwe n’abimutse bari munzira y’Imana, kandi ubagirire imbabazi ubareke, mbega mwebwe ntimukunda yuko Imana yobagirira ikigongwe? Nayo niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi hamwe n’Impuhwe zihagije
